TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit ContentLocatorBase extends System.Object implements class System.ComponentModel.INotifyPropertyChanged

Docs.summary: コンテンツの項目を識別するオブジェクトを表します。

remarks.format:
## 解説 Derived from <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> identifies a data item through an ordered list of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorPart> elements.
Derived from <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>, a <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorGroup> identifies a data item through a set of <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocator> elements.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object Clone() cil managed

Docs.summary: この の変更可能な詳細コピーの複製を作成します。
Docs.returns: この の変更可能な詳細コピーの複製。

remarks.format:
## 解説 This <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A> method creates modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects. For convenience, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A> shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation. For more details, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
The cloned <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property will be **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!** even if this source <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase>'s <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen%2A> property is **languageKeyword tag is not supported!!!!**
When copying dependency properties, <xref:System.Windows.Annotations.ContentLocatorBase.Clone%2A> copies resource references and data bindings \(although they might no longer resolve\) but does not copy not animations or current animation values.
## 例
